p: In this study, six EOs and Tve were screened for antimicrobial activity. The EOs were provided by Sigma-Aldrich Chemie GmbH (Steinheim, Germany) and were the following: cinnamon oil, ceylon type ( Cinnamomum zeylanicum); clove bud oil ( Syzygium aromaticum); garlic oil ( Allium sativum); thyme oil ( Thymus vulgaris); oregano oil ( Origanum vulgare); and basil oil ( Ocimum basilicum). Tve obtained from the strain CF 117 was obtained from the collection of the Laboratory of Plant Pathology, Department of Environmental Biology, University “La Sapienza” of Rome.
